mapper.sql: m.Id, m.ParentId, m.ParentIds, m.Name, m.Index, m.Href, m.Icon, m.permission, m.IsShow, m.InsertDate, m.InsertBy, m.UpdateDate, m.UpdateBy, m.Remarks, m.DelFlag

SELECT FROM gg_menu m WHERE m.DelFlag = '1' AND m.ParentId = #{id} ORDER BY m.Index ASC

select FROM gg_menu m WHERE m.ParentId = 8 AND m.DelFlag = '1' ORDER BY m.Index ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gg_menu ( ParentId , ParentIds , Name , `Index` , Href , Icon , Permission , IsShow , InsertBy , InsertDate , UpdateBy , UpdateDate , Remarks , DelFlag )VALUES( #{parentId }, #{parentIds }, #{name }, #{index }, #{href }, #{icon }, #{permission }, #{isShow }, #{insertBy }, #{insertDate }, #{updateBy }, #{updateDate }, #{remarks }, #{delFlag } )
mapper.update: UPDATE gg_menu SET ParentId = #{ parentId }, ParentIds = #{ parentIds }, Name = #{ name }, `Index` = #{ index }, Href = #{ href }, Icon = #{ icon }, Permission = #{ permission }, IsShow = #{ isShow }, InsertBy = #{ insertBy }, UpdateBy = #{ updateBy }, UpdateDate = #{ updateDate }, Remarks = #{ remarks }, DelFlag = #{ delFlag } WHERE Id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE gg_menu SET DelFlag = {delFlag} WHERE Id = #{Id}
